Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Hiroyuki Fukuchi				fukuchi@elelab.nsc.co.jp
Electronics Labs. / Nippon Steel Corp.		phone: +81-427-68-6114
5-10-1 Fuchinobe, Sagamihara, 229, JAPAN	fax:   +81-427-68-5969
------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test2"
	"Test2" means the second item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test2.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test2_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test2_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test2_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test2_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test2_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					0
	extension				no
	transmission channel allocation		yes
	phantom center				no
	prediction				no
	dynamic cross talk			no
	sampling freq.				48K
	LFE					no
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				no
	bitrate base stream			384kbps
	configuration				3/2
